about_the_game:
Fantasy Journey is a turn based battle deck building game. Including PVE and PVP gameplay, players can use various mechanisms and distinct decks to battle on a 10x10 chessboard. The game is designed to minimize randomness as much as possible, and players' actions will have a greater impact on the outcome.

Card group construction

Select card characters to join the construction and allocate their skill points

Specify whether to attack first or later, and the different order of attack may affect the strategy of construction

Card series

The game consists of multiple series, each with unique gameplay mechanics

Each deck can only select card characters from the same series

You won't be able to match opponents who use the same series of decks as you in the game

Equipment

As the game progresses, you can choose to use multiple pieces of equipment

Equipment x construction will bring richer gameplay strategies

I hope you can have a thrilling and intense battle experience in 'Fantasy Journey'!

Some of the cards in the game use AI generated and manually processed images, including material packs purchased from the Asset Store and generated based on original images.

Special thanks to Yu Gi Oh! Master Duel! It brought inspiration and creativity to 'Fantasy Journey'.
